p: The effect of the tested honeys on the viability of HepG2 cells are comparable with that of sugar syrup, thyme and manuka honeys on the viability of PC3, DU145 human prostate cancer cell lines, and THP-1 cell lines [ 58, 59, 60]. Taken together, honey treatments of 1.0% and 2.0% ( w/ v) for 24 h were selected for subsequent investigations.
